c74object.name: valconvert
c74object.digest: Useful scalings in a single object
c74object.description: valconvert is used to perform several useful scaling operations in a single package. It will scale incoming ints, floats or even lists. The mode of operation can be easily changed and all scalings can also be inverted. There is also an audio-rate version: valconvert~.

objarg.name: mode
objarg.digest: Select the scaling mode for valconvert
objarg.description: Sets the scaling mode to change how valconvert scales the input. The options are: none(no scaling), scale(linear scaling), log (logarithmic scaling), exp (exponential scaling), pitch (scales to semitones, then converts to speed multiplier), ipitch (scale from speed / freq multiplier to semitones then scale as specified to linear output), amp (scales to decibel range then coverts to linear amplitude), iamp (scales from linear amplitude to decibels and outputs in the specified linear output range).

objarg.name: input-low
objarg.digest: Set the low value of the input range
objarg.description: Sets the low value of the expected input range. Incoming values are clipped to this range.

objarg.name: input-high
objarg.digest: Set the high value of the input range
objarg.description: Sets the high value of the expected input range. Incoming values are clipped to this range.

objarg.name: output-low
objarg.digest: Set the low value of the output range
objarg.description: Sets the low end of the output range. This will be the lowest possible output that the input gets scaled to. Incoming values are clipped to this range.

objarg.name: output-high
objarg.digest: Set the high value of the output range
objarg.description: Sets the high end of the output range. This will be the highest possible output that the input gets scaled to. Incoming values are clipped to this range.

method.name: int
method.description: Scales the input and outputs a float.

method.name: float
method.description: Scales the input and outputs a float.

method.name: list
method.description: Scales the input as a list of floats.

method.name: message
method.digest: Changes the mode and scale of valconvert.
method.description: By inputting a message formatted the same as the objects arguments (mode low-input high-input low-output high-output), one can dynamically change the scaling mode and ranges at any time.

entry.name: float
entry.description: When valconvert receives a value, that value is scaled, based on the chosen mode, to the indicated output range of values.
